member.name: T:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation
member.summary: The Geolocation component represents an object able to programmatically obtain the position of the device.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class together with the specified container.
member.param: A that represents the container for the component.

member.name: E:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.PositionChanged
member.summary: Fired when the location of the browser changes while this component has an active watch.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.OnPositionChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Fires the PositionChanged event.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.ActiveWatch
member.summary: Enables or disables active watch mode for this geolocation component. When enabled, the event be fired automatically each time the position of the device changes.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.EnableHighAccuracy
member.summary: Indicates the application would like to receive the best possible results.
member.remarks: If true and if the device is able to provide a more accurate position, it will do so. Note that this can result in slower response times or increased power consumption (with a GPS chip on a mobile device for example). On the other hand, if false, the device can take the liberty to save resources by responding more quickly and/or using less power.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.Timeout
member.summary: Sets or gets the maximum length of time (in milliseconds) the device is allowed to take in order to return a position.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.MaximumAge
member.summary: Indicates the maximum age in milliseconds of a possible cached position that is acceptable to return.
member.remarks: If set to 0, it means that the device cannot use a cached position and must attempt to retrieve the real current position. If set to -1 the device must return a cached position regardless of its age.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.LastPosition
member.summary: Returns the last position detected by the device.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.GetCurrentPosition(System.Action{Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position})
member.summary: Returns the current position of the device.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.GetCurrentPositionAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously returns the current position of the device.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.ProcessCallbackWebEvent(Wisej.Core.WisejEventArgs)
member.summary: Process the getCurrentPosition response from the client.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.Site
member.summary: Returns or sets the associated with the .
member.returns: The object associated with the component; or null, if the component does not have a site.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.DesignMode
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the is currently in design mode.
member.returns: true if the is in design mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.OnWebEvent(Wisej.Core.WisejEventArgs)
member.summary: Processes the event from the client.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Geolocation.OnWebRender(System.Object)
member.summary: Renders the client component.

member.name: T:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.StatusCode
member.summary: Represents the status of the Position object.

member.name: F:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.StatusCode.Success
member.summary: The position was retrieved successfully.

member.name: F:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.StatusCode.PermissionDenied
member.summary: The acquisition of the geolocation information failed because the page didn't have the permission to do it.

member.name: F:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.StatusCode.PositionUnavailable
member.summary: The acquisition of the geolocation failed because at least one internal source of position returned an internal error.

member.name: F:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.StatusCode.Timeout
member.summary: The time allowed to acquire the geolocation, defined by the Timeout information was reached before the information was obtained.

member.name: F:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.StatusCode.InvalidResponse
member.summary: The response from the client was received in an invalid format.

member.name: T:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position
member.summary: Represents the position of the concerned device at a given time. The position, represented by a Coordinates object, comprehends the 2D position of the device, on a spheroid representing the Earth, but also its altitude and its speed.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The position information from the client.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.TimeStamp
member.summary: Returns the time at which the position was retrieved.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.Status
member.summary: Returns the status of the position object.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Returns the error message returned by the client or null.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.Latitude
member.summary: Returns a double representing the position's latitude in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.Longitude
member.summary: Returns a double representing the position's longitude in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.Altitude
member.summary: Returns a double representing the position's altitude in meters, relative to sea level.
member.remarks: This value can be NaN if the implementation cannot provide the data.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.Accuracy
member.summary: Returns a double representing the accuracy of the latitude and longitude properties, expressed in meters.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.AltitudeAccuracy
member.summary: Returns a double representing the accuracy of the altitude expressed in meters. This value can be NaN.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.Heading
member.summary: Returns a double representing the direction in which the device is traveling.
member.remarks: This value, specified in degrees, indicates how far off from heading true north the device is. 0 degrees represents true north, and the direction is determined clockwise (which means that east is 90 degrees and west is 270 degrees). If speed is 0, heading is NaN. If the device is unable to provide heading information, this value is NaN.

member.name: P:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.Speed
member.summary: Returns a double representing the velocity of the device in meters per second. This value can be NaN.

member.name: M:Wisej.Ext.Geolocation.Position.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

summary.para: Geolocation component. Adds geolocation capabilities with Wisej applications.
